#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=UEFA Champions League 2007/08 : Celtic 1-1 Spartak Moscow
#Text=Wednesday , August 29 , 2007

#Text=August 29 200719:45 ( UTC+1 ) Celtic 1 – 1 Spartak Moscow Celtic Park , Glasgow Attendance : 57,854 Referee : Roberto Rosetti McDonald 27 ' Caldwell 28 ' Riordan 118 ' McDonald 97 ' Zurawski 97 ' McGeady 103 ' Riordan 103 ' Naylor 109 ' O'Dea 109 ' Vennegoor of Hesselink 114 Caldwell Nakamura Vennegoor of Hesselink Riordan Zurawski Celtic go through 4-3 on penalties .

#Text=Man of the Match Artur Boruc Pavlyuchenko 25 Pavlyuchenko 45 ' Shishkin 84 ' Torbinsky 100 ' Stranzl 84 ' Welliton 87'Dedura 87 ' Bystrov 95 ' Kalynychenko 95 ' Torbinsky 100 ' Boyarintsev 100 ' Mozart Titov Pavlyuchenko Şoava Kalynychenko
#Text=Celtic headed into this match knowing a goal would send them into the group stages .
#Text=Celtic started well when Jan Vennegoor of Hesselink shouldered Shunsuke Nakamura 's cross over the bar after ten minutes .
#Text=If the Dutchman had 've been more precise Celtic could 've controlled the game from the start .
#Text=Five minutes later Scott McDonald played a one-two with Vennegoor of Hesselink who played a good short ball back which fell right for McDonald 's left foot but he agonisingly hit wide .
#Text=It was n't all Celtic though .
#Text=Spartak Moscow counter-attacked brilliantly and nearly scored 17 minuted in .
#Text=Artur Boruc made a last-ditch save and Lee Naylor cleared after Vladimir Bystrov cut the ball back to Dmitri Torbinsky just outside the box .
#Text=Just 60 seconds later Aiden McGeady hit a good shot wide of the Moscow goal .
#Text=Then 25 minutes in , the referee made the worst decision of the match .
#Text=Welliton , the Brazilian striker , shot straight at Artur Boruc and the ball bounced off him and hit Gary Caldwell 's grounded hand .
#Text=The referee gave the penalty .
#Text=There was nowhere for Caldwell to go and the penalty should not have been given .
#Text=However Pavlyuchenko 's penalty hit the post .
#Text=2 minutes later Celtic showed no signs of giving up .
#Text=Scott McDonald scored his first Celtic goal after Massimo Donati 's shot deflected off a defender and fell for McDonald on his stronger right foot .
#Text=He slotted it straight past the keeper to give Celtic a 1-0 lead .

#Text=35 minutes into the match , Bystrov , who 'd been causing Celtic , mainly Lee Naylor , many problems , sprinted past Lee Naylor again and if it was n't for captain Stephen McManus blocking the shot , it could 've been 1-1 .
#Text=Just before half time Spartak scored from a corner after scrappy Celtic defending .
#Text=Vennegoor of Hesselink and Mark Wilson could n't clear the ball and Pavlyuchenko , who missed a penalty earlier , controlled and slotted the ball past a very angry Artur Boruc .
#Text=In first half stoppage time , Bystrov powered down the left wing and Naylor gave away another corner , luckily though the referee blew his whistle .

#Text=But that did n't stop Artur Boruc from going over to Lee Naylor and shouting at him . Lee Naylor hit back and if it was n't for Caldwell and McGeady breaking it up they could 've both been sent off .
#Text=The second half started as lively as the first .
#Text=Vennegoor of Hesselink was being held in the box in the 51st minute but no penalty was given .
#Text=The next big chance was when the ball fell for Vennegoor of Hesselink in the 65th minute , he turned and dragged a point-blank shot wide .
#Text=From the 77th minute onwards the game started to open up with McDonald and Vennegoor of Hesselink having two great chances before Nakamura had three chances in two minutes .
#Text=In the 84th minute Nakamura had a chance to score a free-kick after Vennegoor of Hesselink was taken down by Martin Stranzl , 21 yards out from goal .

#Text=Stranzl was then sent off by the referee and Spartak Moscow were left with ten men for the remainder of the match . Unfortunately Nakamura 's free-kick hit McDonald as it made it 's way toward the goal .
#Text=Celtic and Spartak both had chances before the full time whistle went .
#Text=Celtic were very attacking from the start of extra time .
#Text=The man advantage seemed to be helping Celtic as McDonald and Vennegoor of Hesselink both missed good chances in the first five minutes .
#Text=In the 99th minute Aiden McGeady made a good run down the right wing to find nobody in the box .
#Text=Forced to make a shot , it ended it up going off for a throw in .
#Text=Just before extra time half time Derek Riordan , who replaced McGeady , picked up the ball and slammed a brilliant shot just a yard wide on his European début .
#Text=Five minutes into the second half of extra time , Maksym Kalynychenko hit a superb shot which Boruc got a vital touch to .
#Text=The ball then went straight down to the Spartak box but Vennegoor of Hesselink could only hit into Stipe Pletikosa 's hands .
#Text=In the 24th minute , Celtic were gifted a penalty after Scott Brown 's power shot struck Radoslav Kováč 's arm .
#Text=Vennegoor smashed the penalty into the bar .
#Text=Six minutes later the referee blew the whistle .
#Text=The match was going to penalties .
#Text=Penalty takers Celtic 1 ) Caldwell 2 ) Nakamura 3 ) Vennegoor of Hesselink 4 ) Riordan 5 ) Zurawski
#Text=Spartak Moscow 1 ) Mozart 2 ) Titov 3 ) Pavlyuchenko 4 ) Şoava 5 ) Kalynychenko
#Text=Caldwell scored his penalty and Mozart equalised .
#Text=Nakamura smashed his penalty against the bar but Boruc saved Titov 's .
#Text=Vennegoor of Hesselink scored his penalty this time round and so too did Pavlyuchenko .
#Text=Riordan scored the perfect penalty and Şoava scored his .
#Text=Zurawski knocked his home and Kalynychenko had his saved by Boruc .
#Text=Man of the Match Artur Boruc
#Text=Team 1 2 3 4 5 Total Celtic Spartak Moscow
